metadata.title: CVE-2022-23437 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: There's a vulnerability within the Apache Xerces Java (XercesJ) XML parserwhen handling specially crafted XML document payloads. This causes, theXercesJ XML parser to wait in an infinite loop, which may sometimes consumesystem resources for prolonged duration. This vulnerability is presentwithin XercesJ version 2.12.1 and the previous versions.

criterions.comment: libxerces2-java package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
